descriptions: Transform your home into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This stunning set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with warm yellow LED lights, 2 festive red bows, and a metal hanger for easy display. Made with high-quality PE synthetic fir, these decorations are perfect for adding a touch of holiday cheer to your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves. Battery operated for convenience, this set is ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties. Don't miss out on making your space merry and bright this holiday season!

Made from high-quality PE synthetic fir, these decorations are perfect for adorning your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves. The garlands are 106 inches long with 315 branch tips, while the wreath measures 17.72 inches in diameter. Get ready to spread joy and festive spirit with the Yingzhao Christmas Wreath Set!
